subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
Corrupted from {{lang|zh|恥}}; first used in Eastern Han dynasty. Listed as an unorthodox form ({{l|zh|俗字}}) in the Kangxi Dictionary. Superficially 
a {{Han compound|耳|止|c1=s|c2=p|ls=psc|nocap=1}}.

Officially adopted as {{Han simp|恥|nocap=1}} in mainland China.
